stimulusHtml: For what values of t,0 ≤ t ≤ 3 , is the particle's instantaneous velocity the same as its average velocity on the closed interval [0,3] ?

features.html: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity at any time t ≥ 0 is given by v(t) = 3t2 − 2t − 1 . The position x(t) is 5 for t = 2 .
